title: Hey Riot :D
body: so like my accounts been perma banned for a while now from me swearing at a player for trolling me but like me doing good on my new account just cruising playing so like wondering if i could get my old account back so i dont have to spend hundreds of dollars all over again :) if u can unban tyler surley u can unban some random aussie teen just wanting to have a good time <3

replies.body: He had his player ban removed, meaning he was allowed to create accounts again. At no time did he have any account bans removed. Permanent account bans are exactly that, permanent. The only exception is if the ban was made in error.

i reckon having an account permantly banned because another player trolled you is a pretty good reason to unban it but oh well.... maybe riot should work on players ruining the game rather than players reacting to their game getting ruined hehe just a thought

Retaliation (which is different from defending yourself), isn't an acceptable response. There are still at least 3 other people you are affecting by being negative too. You would have faced at least one prior punishment, which explicitly states that any further violations will result in permanent suspension of the account.

By firing back, you are ruining the game for other people just as much as the one who initiates the behaviour. Hence why both parties are punished.
riot ban people defending themselves all the tie their ifs system maybe 1000x faster but it is far worse then tribunal
